title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs in a bowl and add grated Parmesan.
Drain pasta, mix with pancetta, then add egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 1 hour.
Grill or fry chicken pieces until cooked.
Saut√© onions, add tomato puree and spices.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, radishes, or poached egg
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toasted bread.
Drizzle with olive oil and add any optional toppings.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop the romaine lettuce and place it in a bowl.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to combine.
